name: Impenetrable Stance
effects: Increase DEF and SPR by 50% for 3 turns to all allies
Reduce ATK and MAG by 20% for 3 turns to all allies
Restore 1150 (+8x, Heal) HP split over 3 turns to all allies

name: Impenetrable Stance
堅守之陣
수호진
Posture impénétrable
Schildwall
Formación tortuga
desc_short: Reduce ATK and MAG and boost DEF and SPR for all allies, and gradually restore HP
降低全體隊員攻擊魔力的數值同時提高防禦精神的數值+持續恢復HP
아군 전체의 공격력과 마력 감소, 방어력과 정신력 상승+HP 서서히 회복
Réduit ATT/MAGIE et augmente DEF/PSY de tous les alliés et restaure progressivement les PV
Verringert ANG und MAG, aber erhöht ABW und PSY aller Verbündeten, stellt allmählich LP wieder her.
Reduce ATQ y MAG y aumenta DEF y ESP a todos los aliados, recupera VIT poco a poco
desc_long: Reduces ATK and MAG and boosts DEF and SPR for all allies, and gradually restores HP.
降低全體隊員攻擊魔力的數值，同時提高防禦精神的數值，並持續恢復HP。
아군 전체의 공격력과 마력이 감소하고, 방어력과 정신력이 상승하며, HP가 서서히 회복합니다.
Réduit ATT/MAGIE et augmente DEF/PSY de tous les alliés et restaure progressivement les PV
Verringert ANG und MAG, aber erhöht ABW und PSY aller Verbündeten, stellt allmählich LP wieder her.
